name: Sportsball (itch) (FreeKeyDev)
description:
Sportsball is an upcoming 2D Platform Fighter game with multiple game modes, characters, stages, and of course, specials! Score against the computer or play against a friend in this fast-paced local multiplayer experience. Whether you're competitive, or just looking for a funny casual party game, Sportsball has you covered!

This is a Pre-Release Milestone 1 build, everything shown is subject to change
